Directives > ui-slider

ui-slider

Slider Dark


<ui-slider dark slider-model="sliderModel" slider-to="400" slider-from="10" real-time="true" ></ui-slider>

Slider Vertical


<ui-slider vertical slider-model="sliderModel" slider-to="400" slider-from="10" real-time="true" ></ui-slider>

ui-accordion Options

Name type description
slider-model object The object representing the model the slider is bound to.
slider-from integer Defines the lower limit the slider can be set to (default: 1).
slider-to integer Defines the upper limit the slider can be set to (default: 100).
real-time boolean Defines whether the model should be updated on slide mouse move (default: false).
